message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150.  I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $125 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
